SEARCH
Package Server.Model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
Server.Model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
Represents the game model, contain information about the game state, players, board, and chat.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel(String lobbyID, List<String> players)
      Creates a new instance of GameModel class using the specified unique identifier and the list of players. The method initializes all the class fields and generates the game objects (board, players, common goals) based on the JSON configuration files. It also sets the initial state of the game to STARTING and the current player to the first player in the list.
      Parameters:
      lobbyID - the unique identifier of the game
      players - the list of players' name to be added to the game

  • Method Details

    • selectTiles

      public List<Tile> selectTiles(List<Coordinates> coordinates) throws NullTileException, NoValidMoveException
      This method allows retrieving the tiles at the given coordinates on the board. It first validates that the move is legal by calling the convalidateMove method of the board object. If the move is valid, it returns the tiles at the given coordinates using the getTiles method of the board object.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - a list of Coordinates objects representing the tiles to retrieve
      Returns:
      a list of Tile objects representing the tiles at the given coordinates
      Throws:
      NullTileException - if the tiles at the given coordinates are null
      NoValidMoveException - if the move is not valid

    • checkRefill

      public void checkRefill() throws CantRefillBoardException
      This method checks if the refill of the board is needed.
      Throws:
      CantRefillBoardException - when the bag han not enough tiles to refill the board.

    • insertTiles

      public void insertTiles(List<Integer> sort, List<Tile> tiles, int column) throws PlayerException
      This method is used to insert tiles on the player's personal shelf.
      Parameters:
      sort - a list of integers representing the order in which the tiles should be inserted
      tiles - a list of tiles that the player wants to insert
      column - an integer representing the column of the personal shelf where the tiles should be inserted
      Throws:
      PlayerException - if the player doesn't have enough space in their personal shelf
      InvalidInputException - if the player didn't insert the correct parameters

    • writeChat

      public void writeChat(String from, String message, String to) throws ChatException
      Writes a message in the chat room.
      Parameters:
      from - the player who sent the message
      message - the body of the message
      to - the player to whom the message is addressed NULL if it's broadcast
      Throws:
      ChatException

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(String id) throws PlayerNotFoundException
      Returns the player with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the player
      Returns:
      the player with the specified ID
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the player with the specified ID is not found

    • completeTurn

      public void completeTurn(List<Tile> tiles)
      It's called when the current player crashes the game between the selectTiles and the insertTiles. It will find the first column where the player can insert the tiles, and it will insert them.
      Parameters:
      tiles - the tiles to insert
